commit message:
Fix bug related to result list
Implemented resizeable dice area

Moved 'Restore all results' to top result area (Fixes issue #1)
Updated 9 patch of resizable area handle (Fixes issue #2)
Rich context menu for dice and results
Fix backward compatibility issues with Android 2.2

Added startup page to avoid ANR
Roll result computation and media output handled on non-UI thread

Support to 4 different styles
Edit activities shown as dialogs in order to look better on large display
Licences dialog separated from about dialog
Removed unused resources
